channel.title: Show IATI: Download a daily snapshot of all IATI data
channel.description:
_**I posted this on another discussion a while ago, and I only got 2 :heart:s :smile: ! But I use this tool frequently, so I thought I’d share it again.**_
https://andylolz.github.io/iati-data-dump/
Lots of IATI tools need to download all IATI data, and they each have their own code to do it. Even on a fast connection, it can take a few hours. Swapping in [IATI data dump](https://andylolz.github.io/iati-data-dump/) as a [microservice](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microservices) would significantly speed up (for instance) the [IATI Dashboard](http://dashboard.iatistandard.org/) updates (which no longer run daily because of how long it takes).
I also [wrote a blog about this](http://www.publishwhatyoufund.org/download-iati-data-lightning-fast/).
